mapper.insert: insert into USER_INFO ( ID, PWD, NAME, BIRTH, SEX, EMAIL, TELNO, URL, RCVYN, NICK, SCOR, IMG) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{email}, #{telno}, #{url}, #{rcvyn}, #{nick}, #{scor}, #{img})
mapper.update: update USER_INFO set CID=#{cid}, PWD=#{pwd}, NAME=#{name}, BIRTH=#{birth}, SEX=#{sex}, EMAIL=#{email}, TELNO=#{telno}, URL=#{url}, RCVYN=#{rcvyn}, NICK=#{nick}, SCOR=#{scor}, IMG=#{img}, UPDDT=sysdate where ID = #{id}
